Prerequisites: PREREQUISITE: ACG 4632 WITH A GRADE OF "C" OR BETTER.
Course Description: THEORY OF AUDITING AND DEVELOPMENT OF AUDIT PROGRAMS; PROCEDURES OF OBTAINING AUDIT EVIDENCE; AUDITOR RESPONSIBILITY UNDER SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION REQUIREMENTS; AND AUDITING COMPUTERIZED SYSTEMS. SUBSEQUENT CREDIT FOR ACG 5635 IS NOT PERMITTED.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
